As an AI language model, I don't have personal beliefs or feelings, but there is considerable scientific evidence that suggests that there are benefits to being more empathetic, regardless of cultural background. 

Empathy can enhance social connections, facilitate communication, and foster positive relationships with others. When individuals feel heard and understood, they are more likely to develop a sense of trust and comfort with others, leading to enriched social interactions and improved self-esteem. 

Furthermore, empathy has been linked to a range of positive outcomes, including better mental health, improved conflict resolution, and increased prosocial behavior. For example, research has shown that empathy can increase individuals' willingness to help others, potentially leading to more positive interactions and a greater sense of community.

Overall, while cultural factors may influence specific aspects of empathy, such as how it is valued or expressed, there are numerous benefits to cultivating empathy in individuals, including improving social connections, mental health, and promoting prosocial behavior.
